param.name: doDataBind
param.span: 如果為 ，執行個體化樣板便會繫結至可用的資料 (通常發生在第一次要求時)。

span.span: If , the instantiated templates bind to available data (which usually happens on the first request).

param.span: 如果為 ，樣板不會繫結至資料，而是依賴檢視狀態將資料填入 (通常發生在後續回傳時)。

span.span: If , the templates do not bind to data, and instead rely on view state to fill them in (which usually happens on subsequent postbacks).

summary.span: 傳回 ，指出清單是否必須以資料表形式呈現。

returns.span: 如果清單必須以資料表形式轉譯，否則為 。

span.span: if the list must be rendered as a table; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要變更用來轉譯清單檢視的方式，可以覆寫此方法。This method can be overridden in order to change the manner in which the list view is rendered. > [!NOTE] > 即使方法會傳回`true`、 目標裝置可能不支援資料表、 在此情況下的清單檢視將不會轉譯為資料表。Even if the method returns `true`, the target device might not support tables, in which case the list view will not be rendered as a table. 方法會傳回`Boolean`，表示指定的資料表可以正確地顯示在 [目標裝置] 畫面中，而屬性類別會傳回`Boolean`，指出是否在裝置完全支援資料表。The method returns a `Boolean` that indicates whether the specified table will fit on the target device screen, whereas the property of the class returns a `Boolean` that indicates whether the device supports tables at all.

related.span: 調整控制項行為的架構概觀

protected public: static initonly System::String ^ ShowMore;

summary.span: 如果此常數 ("__more") 出現在回傳引數中，表示瀏覽器應該移至目前可見項目之後的第一個項目。

span.span: A constant ("__more"), and if present in the postback arguments, indicates that the browser should jump to the first item beyond the currently visible items.

summary.span: 如果內部欄位 ("__more*n*"，其中 *n* 是數字) 出現在回傳引數中，表示瀏覽器應該移至清單中的特定項目。

span.span: An internal field ("__more*n*"), where *n* is a number, and if present in the postback arguments, indicates that the browser should jump to a specific item in the list.
